content.label: Don‚Äôt know how to feel really. After hundreds and hundreds of Ads I finally downloaded the game. As soon as I book it up it shuts down. Oh well

This is a pay to win game. It‚Äôs fun in the lower levels when no one pays for packs. But the skins on characters actually give them unfair advantages caused only by money. I don‚Äôt respect this kind of play style at all, it‚Äôs very prejudiced in its very premise. You do what you want, but this game discriminates those who have money against those who don‚Äôt.

It‚Äôs an old game not enough players. It‚Äôs also a ton of ad watching in order to open things.Sometimes I‚Äôm waiting a minute for a game. The cards are also very hard to get leveled up unless you pay. If you win against a player that‚Äôs paid you will get a worse reward.

title.label: An amazing game but gets much too hard to rank up

content.label: This game is a true masterpiece. The only problem is, this is a p2w game. I don‚Äôt spend money. I think p2w players should only have to go against other p2w players. That would make the game fair and easy to rank up. Also, I think people should be matched for decks (lvl of cards, rarity, etc etc) Also, the matchmaking system is stupid. I once went against someone 7 times in a row. And you what? I lost 7 times in a row. Also, I think it‚Äôs stupid if I use the same card I like I lose trophies for it. They are literally punishing you for playing how you want to play. The gameplay is good, but it comes down to topdeck madness (RNG) to draw a good card at the right time. Getting new cards IS SO HARD TOO. And it takes 8 hours to open it! haha, game... I just think this a good game, but the cons outweigh the pros HEAVILY. Oh yeah. Did I mention the event system is stupid? You would think people would be put on rank. But NO. I‚Äôm stuck with the same cards in the same league because I can‚Äôt get a rank-up.  I just wish progression was easier. I will change my mind if these are fixed. Until then, 2 stars.

I love BADLAND brawl it‚Äôs a fun game you get to fight people and I love all the levels on it it‚Äôs just so much fun!!!!!! And I love the first BADLAND it‚Äôs so much fun and I love that you can make levels on it and BADLAND 2 is fantastic I love the graphics and the levels but I wish it was more longer because It‚Äôs a pretty short game and please have a level editor on BADLAND 2 that would be amazing and one more thing please make BADLAND 3 please I been wanting BADLAND 3 to come out because ever sense I bought BADLAND 2 I been wanting BADLAND 3 to come out but still I give all of them 5 stars!!!!!!!!!!

Been playing this over a year.  The game was fun and challenging.  You can develop different teams for different strategies. But, developer keeps re-balancing the clones to the point where it is just too much.  Hard to enjoy a game long term when the target keeps moving.
Would have been willing to give it 4 stars if the game didn‚Äôt notify me to try and get me to play the game rather than only when my eggs are ready or enhancements were finished.
Like bruh where is it

title.label: It‚Äôs not well balance, some clones are way to powerful

content.label: The game is fun, but this isn‚Äôt well balance, how come you level up by just donating, so you can reach level 20 by just donating clones.

tornado is still too small from back when you nerfed it, and the floating bomb cluster is too powerful, now the new rune system defeats all strategy whatsoever. I‚Äôve been playing for over 2 years. This latest update with runes could be the game killer for me. 
Update 8/13 new overseer is by far the dumbest clone you‚Äôve come up with yet. It needs so much fixing, and the idea of it is just stupid. You lose me more and more with each update.

This is the game that wins , I look forward to playing this daily, and on weekends and during the rollout of the new update. It‚Äôs kept me wanting while quenching my video game thirst.
 Great job guys. Let me get controller compatibility please.üëÄ

title.label: Enemies take less damage if you don‚Äôt pay.

content.label: I‚Äôve noticed a strange ‚Äúbug‚Äù. I sent 12 bombs into an enemies tower, yet I still lost the matches, why? Because they‚Äôre taking zero damage from bombs. It killed the game for me.

This game is great the only downside is when you‚Äôre first starting out and aren‚Äôt in an elite status, the events just throw you against whoever. They give you both the same tower health but who knows what level they‚Äôre at? I know they‚Äôre definitely higher because they‚Äôve got way better cards and I‚Äôm losing everytime!!! They should definitely do it the same for events as they do for a normal brawl!!!! Put us against someone the same level!!
So I guess this is were all the birds that died went they are at the gulag right now fighting for their lives
This game is one of the best.

I actually enjoyed this game for quite some time, even buying the monthly pass. Yet, as you progress, you'll quickly face off against higher level players with an absurd deck. So, you should still expect high level, unfair, and ridiculously unbalanced matches after a short while.

title.label: Disappointed !! The new update make me delete the game.. reduce all bomb damages

content.label: After 18 months playing this game and spend something around 500$ and being in top 50 players of this game ..i have to say that developers dont care you are a loyal player to them and spend 5 hours daily and advertise the game to most of the people i know i have to say that means nothing to them .. the most hateful part about this game is that each month the whole game will change to something more unfair .
Kind of boring to me

title.label: Used to love this game. I‚Äôm done with it now.

content.label: I‚Äôve never written a review before but I‚Äôve played this for quite awhile now and I LOVED this game. I get trying to add and tweak it to be more appealing to new and old time players of this well crafted game. But I can‚Äôt take how it is now in this format. It‚Äôs unplayable and frustrating now. The fun I loved in this is gone now I‚Äôm just aggravated when I play. So thank you for mAking a great game but it‚Äôs driving me away now. I had fun while it lasted :)

title.label: A little over a year playing...

content.label:
I really really love playing this game. I wasn‚Äôt in to PvP type of games when I first started playing. The pace, physics based play, and unique goal just drew me in. First I wanted to get all the clones, then I wanted to level up all my clones, and now I‚Äôm interested in using the Runes in unique ways. If there is one game I want to play and invite my friends and family to play it‚Äôs this. I‚Äôve watched as my Tribe has gone from a few casual players to at least 30 plus dedicated players that stick around. Playing 2v2 or motivating each other to keep playing when we hit a major losing streak. Combos are as endless as your imagination!  Give it a try at least! There are a few things I‚Äôd like to see. Like a few lower level clones added and not just Unreals. Also, some of the event brawls are so unique I would love to have an option to play those when I want. Like bomb rain, sudden death, or even brawl ball (not a fan lol). The choice would be great. Also some new backgrounds would be nice. Keep up the great work!  Let‚Äôs make this game even bigger!  Need more people playing. So me n my tribe can whip some butt. 

FRUIT BOWL Co-leader KoLeeOni
Love this game, i can play it for hours.

title.label: Game used to be fun but the developers have runed (read ruined) it

content.label: This game had its short-comings. Too focused on generating revenue by having the algo‚Äôs tuned to get you to spend money to get more gold to upgrade your clones. Also, the algorithm would pair you incorrectly different level player in 2v2 matches. But apart from, that it would still be fun. However, with the latest update and introduction of runes, the game is ruined. Because it unfairly pairs you against other players with higher power clones and runes. Making it impossible to beat them because you don‚Äôt have any runes. And of course there are always glitches in the game. Wish they would just keep the fair and fun and not focus too much in forcing to spend $$ to power up your clones!

One of the best games on my phone.  Great graphics, incredible physics.  Very well done.

Minor Bug - sometimes when I open up the emote menu during the game, then the game ends, it doesn‚Äôt allow me to select an emote.
This game is fun, but I‚Äôve been randomly disconnected for the last three games.
So It‚Äôs all good! There‚Äôs no glitches, and it‚Äôs very fun and addicting it‚Äôs very good!

Loved it for 2 days...pumped $20 into it for some eggs. Then played the same person 5 times in a row. In those 5 games only saw one of my best clones twice. Get ur algorithm together. Nice artwork, polished crap for programming. Same old story out here. Pay to win.

I had been playing this game for quite some time now, I would consider myself a casual free to play player. So I haven‚Äôt spent money on the game. And I was fine with the slow progression since I could finish the season pass and get some cards that way. With the new changes to the season pass being changed from 9 stars to progress to 20 it makes this game almost impossible to be a free to play player. Pretty sad bc the game was really fun and before I felt like I could stay somewhat competitive with the whales but with this change it‚Äôs impossible. Feels bad.
If want to play this game for the fun of it, by all means, download. But DO NOT give these clowns your money! Game has too many inconsistencies for you to spend your hard earned money on it
It is good

I hate this game ,when I had just leveled up and I went to brawl,I lost two times then I realized I had gone down a level I thought it was a glitch and i realized I was still down a level . unfortunately I can‚Äôt stop playing.
Could be a lot more fun without the childish faces that laugh at you. Game could be better if you can figure out how it all goes together to win. If not it is very annoying.
Jumping from 8 to 20 gear requirement is ridiculous. That means you must win 40 gears a day to complete the brawl pass. No thank you. Not paying $4.99 any more.

Was reasonable to play but they changed it with the newest update to 20 gears to get to a new tier on brawl pass. Used to be 8 and we always bought the brawl pass to keep it interesting, but now for the causal player it‚Äôs unlikely to hit tier 50 so it may not be worth it to pay for the pass.
Disappointing, unless you use the strong ones, you have no chance.

I love this game. I like the physics based outcomes of combos and the general fun and mayhem of the brawl. One thing is it takes what feels like forever to get just one unreal clone, and it is hard to get a lot of stuff unless you have the brawl pass, which $4.99 is a lot for not that much. If you price it that much, there should be some more tiers on it. Other than that, I believe this is a fantastic game and give it 5/5.
Very fun game.
I have constantly being challenged against someone 5x my level.. how can u win against that..

title.label: Finally Found A Game I Like

content.label: I have been looking for a good clan based game that was unique and fun for a long time and I have finally found it for now. I like this game a lot. It‚Äôs strategy and a little bit of luck. It‚Äôs also strange gameplay but that‚Äôs what makes it fun in my opinion. A must play.

title.label: Great game but a weird bug

content.label: The game is amazing I play this with friends and I love the 2v2 system.You can invite you tribe (which is also great) to a 2v2 against other players.The egg system is great idk if just get to open the eggs for free forever i can just open them without wait , but the enhancing is great to get double the rewards to upgrade your clones. The 1v1 is also fun to grind out eggs to upgrade. The weird bug is shortly after me and a tribe mate lost a 2v2 I clicked home after looking at the battle result, and I didn‚Äôt see the home screen I saw the overview of a card. It was like an blue energy orb with like wind or some white thing orbiting it and it said the release date was set_by_code it might of said code date idk but it told me I could use it and practice and upgrade it. I clicked upgrade and it said ‚Äúyou need 0 clones to upgrade it‚ÄùIt said I needed 1k to upgrade which I had. When I clicked practice nothing happened but when I clicked use it kicked me to my home screen when I got back on it was normal. It‚Äôs a great game overall that really didn‚Äôt affect anything but it was just weird.
totally unbalanced!
Scammed me

One star until that happens. In a game that has many counters you often know you can‚Äôt beat someone regardless how you play it. Or if you make a bad mistake and fall behind and know you aren‚Äôt going to pull out of it you should have the option to forfeit. No idea why this isn‚Äôt an option as the rest of the game is pretty decent but it will stay a 1 star review until they fix this oversight.

The recent patch, which I assume was supposed to counter the air clones, makes the freezer core both able to move by itself, and immune to arrows, which basically makes it‚Äôs only counter the fireball (which costs more than the core itself) or... surprise... the character that you probably don‚Äôt have unless you spent money on it, the clone with the lightning staff.

All in all very good game but balancing seems to be a major issue as you literally have to use the clones they buff patch to patch in order to win.
